Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a steep mountain road carved on the side of Hafnia Mountain.
Room.LongDescription: There is a sharp drop on the north side, with a snow white valley below you. The south side has a gentle slope leading to a rocky tor overlooking the road. Great eagles wheel above the rocks, occasionally diving and picking up some squealing animal you cannot identify. Smoke rises from a volcano south of here.
